{{RecipeInfobox}}

A Pouch of Gold is a craftable item, that is made from Gold, [[Thread]] and [[Leather]]. While being crafted out of 120 :Gold:, opening a Pouch of Gold returns 100 :Gold:. With this feature, Pouches of Gold are a currency in the game. All [[Auction|auctions]] are done with the currency Pouch of Gold.
